title: Dança dos Famosos (season 18)
text:
Super Dança dos Famosos is the eighteenth season of the <a href="Brazil">Brazil</a>ian reality television show "<a href="Dan%C3%A7a%20dos%20Famosos">Dança dos Famosos</a>" which premiered on May 16, 2021 at (<a href="Time%20in%20Brazil%23Bras%C3%ADlia%20time%2C%20BRT%20%28UTC-03%29">BRT</a> / <a href="Time%20in%20Brazil%23Bras%C3%ADlia%20time%20%E2%88%921%20%28UTC-04%29">AMT</a>) on <a href="TV%20Globo">TV Globo</a>.
It is the first season to feature an "<a href="all-star">all-star</a>" cast, in which previous celebrities who have competed on the show have another chance to win the competition. However, 9 of the returning finalists had already won the title in prior seasons (<a href="Juliana%20Didone">Juliana Didone</a>, <a href="Robson%20da%20Silva">Robson Caetano</a>, <a href="Christiane%20Torloni">Christiane Torloni</a>, <a href="Paolla%20Oliveira">Paolla Oliveira</a>, <a href="Rodrigo%20Simas">Rodrigo Simas</a>, <a href="Marcello%20Melo%20Jr.">Marcello Melo Jr.</a>, <a href="Viviane%20Ara%C3%BAjo%20%28actress%29">Viviane Araújo</a>, <a href="Maria%20Joana">Maria Joana</a> and Lucy Ramos). 
Season 12 saw the most returning contestants, with 3 out of the 18 contestants (Arthur Aguiar, Mariana Santos and <a href="Viviane%20Ara%C3%BAjo%20%28actress%29">Viviane Araújo</a>). <a href="Christiane%20Torloni">Christiane Torloni</a> is the only contestant reunited with her original partner. 
It was the last season hosted by <a href="Fausto%20Silva">Fausto Silva</a> and airing as a segment on "<a href="Doming%C3%A3o%20do%20Faust%C3%A3o">Domingão do Faustão</a>", as the show was planned to air its series finale on December 26, 2021.
<a href="Tiago%20Leifert">Tiago Leifert</a> filled in as host on June 13, 2021, when Fausto Silva had to leave the show in week 5 due to an infection, with Silva expected to return the following week. However, on June 17, 2021, <a href="TV%20Globo">TV Globo</a> announced that Fausto Silva's departure from the network was anticipated by mutual agreement and that he would not return to host the show. As result, "<a href="Doming%C3%A3o%20do%20Faust%C3%A3o">Domingão do Faustão</a>" was abruptly cancelled and the remainder of the season, starting with week 6, was broadcast as its own independent series, with Tiago Leifert taking over as the host permanently.
On August 29, 2021, actress <a href="Paolla%20Oliveira">Paolla Oliveira</a> & Leandro Azevedo won the competition over actor <a href="Rodrigo%20Simas">Rodrigo Simas</a> & Nathalia Ramos and actress Dandara Mariana & Diego Maia, who took 2nd and 3rd place respectively, thus becoming the show's first two-time winner. In addition, Leandro Azevedo became the first professional to win the competition three times.
Couples.
The first two celebrities <a href="Christiane%20Torloni">Christiane Torloni</a> and <a href="Paolla%20Oliveira">Paolla Oliveira</a> were confirmed by <a href="Fausto%20Silva">Fausto Silva</a> on April 30. The first batch of celebrities (Arthur, Claudia, Maria, Mariana, Marcello, Odilon, Paolla, Rodrigo and Sophia) was announced on May 2. On May 9, the final batch of celebrities (Carmo, Christiane, Dandara, Juliana, Lucy, Nelson, Robson, Tiago and Viviane) was also revealed.
